name: Connectioncrawl
description:
What is this game about?

The year is 22XX and you are a freelance high-tech low-life server-crawler.
You receive jobs from contacts that require you to neuroconnect to the dangerous corporate networks to track down datafiles before being cornered by some Killer Software.
Complete enough contracts and you can finally retire and escape this shithole cyber-gig economy.

What do you need to play?
  • A pencil;
  • A printed copy of the FREELANCE ID;
  • A printed copy of the JOB TRACKER;
  • A red and a blue 6-sided dice;
  • A dozen tokens;
    The big pile of business cards you’ve been keeping somewhere (I know you have it);
  • A pawn or something to keep track of your position in the network.
